:orphan:
 
Installation
============

 .. code:: python

     pip install flask-ponywhoosh

 or

 .. code:: bash

     git clone https://github.com/piperod/Flask-PonyWhoosh.git


 .. _Flask: http://flask.pocoo.org/


.. include:: contents.rst.inc
